issue.title: [GLib] Expose AlignStream methods in InputStream, OutputStream classes
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-3319](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-3319). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
In some cases it may be desireable to write padding in between messages to obtain 8- or 64-byte alignment. After ARROW-3212, the IPC metadata is deterministically-sized, so alignment is up to the user
